word: The travelers find all in surprised excitement. The voices of those in the room break out into thanksgiving and praise, saying, \93The Lord is risen indeed, and hath appeared to Simon.\94 Then the two travelers . . . tell the wondrous story of how Jesus has appeared to them. They have just ended, . . . when behold, another Person stands before them. . . . Then they hear a voice which is no other than the voice of their Master. . . .
